data.title: Perfetti Van Melle
data.text:
Airheads

Known for their unique chewy texture and a format that you can pull, roll up and shape, Airheads are available as bars, belts and small bites in a variety of fruity, sweet and sour flavours.

Big Babol

Ever since it was introduced, Big Babol has been a favourite with children around the world. Available in mouth-watering fruit flavours, it has no rivals when it comes to blowing "Big Babols"!

Center Fruit

Center Fruit â a liquid-filled, fruit-flavoured gum â has been a success ever since it was introduced in 2005. It provides a lip-smacking, rib-tickling, tongue-waggling sensation with unique fruit flavours and a tantalising splash of liquid that bursts in the mouth.

Daygum

Daygum is the sugar-free gum that's good for oral health. Chewing Daygum protects teeth by helping to neutralise the formation of plaque acids, one of the risk factors for cavities.

Frisk

Frisk stands for extreme freshness despite its small size. This discrete micro tablet is perfect for whenever you need a boost of intense freshness.

Fruittella

Fruittella products only contain flavours and colourings from natural plant and fruit extracts, so nothing artificial. It goes without saying that Fruittella always contains fruit juice for that extra fruity taste. So you can enjoy Fruittella 'flavours from nature'!

Golia

A traditional Italian brand, Golia is best known as a gummy liquorice candy. Today it's also available in a wide range of flavours and formats: lozenges, balsamic drops, mild to full breath fresheners - or just for sheer pleasure.

Happydent

Happydent offers a variety of functional gums with different formulations for a whiter smile, oral hygiene and fresh breath. As a sugar-free gum, it helps neutralise plaque acids.

Klene

Klene has been synonymous with fine quality liquorice in The Netherlands since 1876. Klene today enjoys an innovative character, coming in a vast array of varieties: traditional, sugar-free and liquorice and candy combinations.

Look-O-Look

Itâs all about having fun and enjoying sweets at Look-O-Look. We create a striking shop-in-shop concept in any store: a candyland providing the most delicious selection of sweets â and a ton of fun for the kids.

Meller

Meller is a chewy caramel candy with a delicious chocolate centre. It has a âmore-ishâ effect and is ideal for eating on-the-go.

Morositas

The Morositas brand is well known for its irresistible softness and inimitable juicy taste. It is perfect throughout the day, whether for a quick break or for a moment of sheer pleasure, and is available in a variety of formats and flavours.

Smint

Smint has a unique, triangular shape that distinguishes it from any other candy. In spite of their small size, both Smint sugar-free mints and gum provide immediate and intense freshness, anytime, anywhere.

StopNot

StopNot is a snack that lives up to its name â it's crunchy, tasty and loaded with lip-smacking tangy spice flavours which makes eating just oneâ¦ almost impossible!

Sula

Sula sugar-free candies are available in herbal and fruity flavours. Natural ingredients and juices make them a must for those who enjoy a healthy, active lifestyle.

Vigorsol

Vigorsol stands for freshness. Air Action Vigorsol is our most dynamic and eccentric gum brand â its surprisingly explosive fresh-air effect makes for great and effective TV advertising.
